tiers.name: Bronze
tiers.description: Lower monthly premiums, higher out-of-pocket costs when you use care.
tiers.bestFor: Generally healthy individuals who want protection against worst-case scenarios.

tiers.name: Silver
tiers.description: Moderate premiums and moderate out-of-pocket costs. Silver plans are the basis for subsidy calculations.
tiers.bestFor: Those who qualify for cost-sharing reductions (CSR) or want balanced coverage.

tiers.name: Gold
tiers.description: Higher monthly premiums but lower costs when you need care.
tiers.bestFor: People who use healthcare services frequently or have ongoing medical needs.

tiers.name: Platinum
tiers.description: Highest monthly premiums with the lowest out-of-pocket costs.
tiers.bestFor: Those with significant healthcare needs who want maximum coverage.
